name: GLM
description: Generalized Linear Model implementation in vantage6

ui_visualizations.name: GLM coefficients
ui_visualizations.description: Coefficient data of the GLM, including p-values, Z-values and standard errors

arguments.name: provide_formula
arguments.description: Whether you want to provide an advanced Wilkinson formula or not. If not, you can simply choose predictor and outcome variables, but you cannot provide non-linear relationships.

arguments.name: outcome_variable
arguments.description: The column name of the outcome variable, by default None. If not provided, the formula must be provided instead.

arguments.name: predictor_variables
arguments.description: The column names of the predictor variable, by default None. If not provided, the formula must be provided.

arguments.name: formula
arguments.description: The formula to use for the GLM, by default None. Should be a valid Wilkinson formula for the Python package formulaic (https://matthewwardrop.github.io/formulaic/latest/guides/grammar/). If not provided, the outcome_variable and predictor_variables must be provided.

arguments.name: categorical_predictors
arguments.description: The column names of the predictor variables that are categorical. All columns with string values are considered categorical by default - this option should be used for columns with numerical values that should be treated as categorical.

arguments.name: category_reference_values
arguments.description: The reference values for the categorical variables, by default None. If, for instance, the predictor variable 'A' is a categorical variable with values 'a', 'b', and 'c', and we want 'a' to be the reference value, this dictionary should be {'A': 'a'}.

arguments.name: survival_sensor_column
arguments.description: The survival_sensor_column value, by default None. Required if the family is 'survival'.

arguments.name: tolerance_level
arguments.description: The tolerance level for the convergence of the algorithm, by default 1e-8.

arguments.name: max_iterations
arguments.description: The maximum number of iterations for the algorithm, by default 25.

arguments.name: organizations_to_include
arguments.description: The organizations to include in the computation, by default None. If not provided, all organizations in the collaboration are included.
